title: Buñuel in the Labyrinth of the Turtles
originalTitle: Buñuel en el laberinto de las tortugas
synopsis: Natália, trapped in a tedious job, engages in a search for a stolen heart. In a world where hearts can be deposited in a bank, the protagonist faces a dilemma: give her heart or keep it to herself.

title: A Man Is Dead
synopsis: Brest, 1950. Post-war reconstruction efforts in France have led to poor working conditions. The workers are on strike calling in vain for higher wages. P’tit Zef, Édouard (Mazé), and Désiré take part in demonstrations organized by the CGT syndicate when the situation suddenly becomes violent. The police shoot into the crowd and a bullet hits Édouard. The labor union calls upon the filmmaker René Vautier to film the events. P’tit Zef and Désiré accompany Vautier through the devastated city. Having at his side a man whose only weapon is a camera, P’tit Zef is consumed with anger. He wants revenge for the death of his friend.

title: Apart
synopsis: A layered animation technique slowly reveals three personal stories of grief. The young characters open up with calm, honest observations about the perspective-shifting experience of suddenly losing a parent.

title: Barbeque
synopsis: This film is a journey through the methods of coping with post-traumatic stress disorder, and an exploration of shame and feelings of disembodiment.

title: Between the Shadows
synopsis: Natália, trapped in a tedious job, engages in a search for a stolen heart. In a world where hearts can be deposited in a bank, the protagonist faces a dilemma: give her heart or keep it to herself.

title: Bless You!
synopsis: Everyone gets sick of everyone. But things become really bad when you get sick of yourself.

title: The Call
synopsis: An elderly woman’s bathtub becomes a place from which to escape into memories, fantasies, and other watery reveries.

title: Carlotta's Face
synopsis: As a child, Carlotta didn’t expect the people around her to have faces. She doesn’t even recognize her own face. Years later, she learns about a rare, untreatable deficit of her brain. It was art, after all, that offered her a way to finally recognize herself.

title: Cat Days
synopsis: Jiro, a little boy, feels sick and his father takes him to the doctor, who diagnoses him with a harmless condition. Nonetheless, it shakes the core of the boy’s identity.

title: The Cord
synopsis: A mother, dominating her son with the wrong kind of love and care, won’t let him grow up but preserves his inner child in a helpless state of infantile dependency.

title: Dachshund
synopsis: The dachshund doesn’t get why its behind always has to pee.

title: The Death, Dad & Son
synopsis: Death’s son doesn’t want to take over the family business. He secretly dreams of becoming a guardian angel, this triggers a succession of collapses. Dad will have to get him out of this mess.

title: Deep Love
synopsis: Deep love has finally happened in Ukraine.

title: Elise
synopsis: Alzheimer’s disease is preventing Elise from understanding the world around her. Soon, her daughter, her last anchor to reality, won’t be enough to keep her from diving into her memories.
